enhanced_by.reason: The offer method adds elements to the queue, which is necessary for the poll method to have elements to remove.
The synchronizedQueue method initializes the queue, which is required before any operations like poll can be performed.
The peek method checks the head of the queue without removing it, which can be useful to verify the state of the queue before polling.
The remove method also removes the head of the queue, and its behavior can be compared to poll in test scenarios.
